text: Richard Lester (born Richard Lester Liebman; January 19, 1932Profile , The Times, January 19, 2009; retrieved January 9, 2010.) is an American movie director. Lester is known for his work with the Beatles in the 1960s and his work on the Superman movie series in the 1980s. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Richard Lester: A hard day's life *The Beatles in West Somerset in 1964 * NYT biog *BFI film database Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:American movie directors Category:People from Philadelphia
title: Richard Lester
